WorkItem.ClosedComment: Seems to be working fine here.  Make sure you took the Holy Shield talent or it won't count it.  If you're still having an issue, re-open this ticket and attach your character .xml file.
WorkItem.Description: The tool tip for damage taken displays (on my toon) 35728 normal attack, 25010 blocked attack. This is a 30% reduction but due to paladin talents we get an additional 10% for a total of 40% reduction. This could be why mastery is not being charted as the best stat for us with build Rawr 4.0.20 (Feb 20, 2011) [r58200].

Comments.Message: Change Set 57883 was supose to add holy shield into the calulation, but... perhaps not?
As a temporary way around it I added block value as a % to an item.
I might have missed a spot where this is being calculated.  I'll check it when I get home.
